The '''Common Cape''' is a [[cape]] given to all players who use their Microsoft account to log into {{BE}} at any point from May 6, 2025 to May 5, 2026.<ref>{{mcnet|new-cape-alert|New cape alert|May 6, 2025|Staff}}</ref>{{better source needed|Please see [[Talk:Common Cape#Obtainable via Bedrock only?]]}}

== Appearance ==
The cape design is based on the [[grass block]]. A green semicircle with a darker gradient towards the center appears at the top of the cape, representing the grass. A brown base with silver dots represents the dirt.

== Distribution ==
Players who used their Microsoft account to log into ''Bedrock Edition'' on any platform during the distribution period to received this cape in both ''Bedrock Edition'' and {{JE}}. A Microsoft account is required to obtain this cape, even on platforms where using one is not required to play the game.

== Trivia ==
* This is the first cape (excluding the [[The Pan Cape! (duplicate)|duplicate version of the Pan Cape]]) to be assigned of a different rarity other than Legendary.
